arts.ttl: Chris Führich the key as Stuttgart dominate struggling Bochum
arts.sum: Stuttgart got the better of Bochum 2-0 on Saturday, Chris Führich converting the home side's dominance with a superb opener while Justin Diehl made an instant impact off the bench, sealing the victory for the hosts. Chris Führich takes a powerful shot to score Stuttgart's opening goal against Bochum - IMAGO/Silas Schueller/DeFodi Images

arts.ttl: Schick hat trick helps Leverkusen cover defensive lapses. Dortmund and Stuttgart win in Bundesliga
arts.sum: Patrik Schick scored a hat trick and injury-hit Bayer Leverkusen overcame a scare before beating Heidenheim 5-2 in the Bundesliga on Saturday. Heidenheim then stunned the defending champions when Marvin Pieringer won the ball from Piero Hincapie and set up Niklas Dorsch to open the scoring in the 10th minute.

arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Leverkusen, Hoffenheim, Dortmund, Stuttgart, and Wolfsburg all victorious
arts.sum: There were no draws in the latest set of five Bundesliga 15:30 kickoffs. Czech internationals Patrik Schick (Leverkusen) and Adam Hlozek (Hoffenheim) were instrumental in helping their teams complete comeback victories. Elsewhere, Stuttgart and Dortmund took care of business with clinical home wins. Wolfsburg also secured their first home win of the season. Coverage of all five simultaneous kickoffs can be found below.

arts.ttl: Stuttgart striker faces months on the sidelines
arts.sum: El Bilal Touré has suffered a broken metatarsal and will be out for months.

arts.ttl: El Bilal Touré to miss several months with a metatarsal fracture adding to VfB Stuttgart’s injury woes
arts.sum: VfB Stuttgart have announced that striker El Bilal Touré will miss several months for the club as he undergoes surgery on an injury picked up on international duty. Touré fractured…

arts.ttl: Who will score for VfB Stuttgart without Deniz Undav?
arts.sum: Undav, Stuttgart’s top scorer with seven goals in 16 competitive games this term, would likely have been relishing such a fixture list after his team suffered a tricky start to the campaign, but instead it will be up to others to take the burden. Any team would suffer if their star striker gets injured, but Sebastian Hoeneß’s VfB Stuttgart look well placed to cope with Deniz Undav's absence given their options up front.

arts.ttl: Hoeneß prepared to turn to in-form Woltemade against Bochum: "Super exciting!"
arts.sum: Speaking at his pre-match presser, VfB Stuttgart trainer Sebastian Hoeneß dropped strong hints that he may be preparing to give Nick Woltemade an audition in this weekend's fixture against Bochum.

arts.ttl: Stuttgart vs. Bochum preview: Visitors eyeing first victory
arts.sum: Bochum will attempt to claim their first win of the Bundesliga season when they travel to the MHP Arena for Saturday’s meeting with Stuttgart.
Action from the German top flight returns after the international break and Alex Jack is on hand to provide score predictions for all nine Bundesliga games this weekend.

arts.ttl: Preview: Stuttgart vs. VfL Bochum - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Stuttgart and VfL Bochum, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
